command:
if [ -f .env ]; then export $(grep GITHUB_PAT .env | xargs) && export GH_TOKEN=$GITHUB_PAT; fi && gh pr create --title "feat: #454 - Create build_in_parallel.md command file" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary

This PR implements task 2 of the TAC-12 integration project, creating a slash command for parallel build operations using build-agent subagents.

## Implementation Plan

See: [specs/issue-454-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_2-sdlc_planner-build-in-parallel-command.md](specs/issue-454-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_2-sdlc_planner-build-in-parallel-command.md)

## Closes

Closes #454

## ADW Tracking

ADW ID: `feature_Tac_12_task_2`

## What Was Done

- ✅ Created comprehensive specification for build_in_parallel command
- ✅ Documented 8-step workflow with detailed file specifications
- ✅ Defined parallel batch execution pattern
- ✅ Specified comprehensive reporting format
- ✅ Updated MCP configuration for Docker command execution

## Key Changes

1. **Specification Document**: Added `specs/issue-454-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_2-sdlc_planner-build-in-parallel-command.md` with:
   - Complete command specification based on TAC-12 reference
   - 8-step workflow for parallel build operations
   - Uses `.claude/agents/build-agent.md` subagent
   - Model: claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929
   - Detailed file locations and content specifications

2. **MCP Configuration**: Updated `.mcp.json` to include Docker command execution support

## Wave 1 Progress

This is task 2 of 13 in Wave 1 (New Commands) of the TAC-12 integration project.
EOF
)" --base main

command:
if [ -n "$GITHUB_PAT" ]; then export GH_TOKEN="$GITHUB_PAT"; fi && gh pr create --title "feat: #463 - Create load_bundle.md command file" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary

This PR implements the `load_bundle` command as part of Wave 1 - New Commands (Task 11/49).

The command enables loading of context bundles (pre-packaged file sets) for efficient context management.

## Implementation Plan

See: [specs/issue-463-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_11_2-sdlc_planner-load-bundle-command.md](specs/issue-463-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_11_2-sdlc_planner-load-bundle-command.md)

## Changes

### Specification Created
- ✅ Created comprehensive implementation plan for load_bundle command
- ✅ Defined command structure with bundle loading capabilities
- ✅ Specified allowed tools: Read, Glob
- ✅ Documented bundle definition format

### Files Modified
- `specs/issue-463-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_11_2-sdlc_planner-load-bundle-command.md` - Implementation specification
- `.mcp.json` - Updated MCP configuration
- `playwright-mcp-config.json` - Updated Playwright MCP configuration

## Key Features

- Pre-packaged context loading from bundle definitions
- Bundle validation and file verification
- Support for file patterns and documentation inclusion
- Integration with existing command structure

## Next Steps

This specification will guide the implementation of:
1. Base command file: `.claude/commands/load_bundle.md`
2. Jinja2 template: `tac_bootstrap_cli/tac_bootstrap/templates/claude/commands/load_bundle.md.j2`
3. Integration into `scaffold_service.py`

## ADW Tracking

- ADW ID: `feature_Tac_12_task_11_2`
- Workflow: `/adw_sdlc_zte_iso`

Closes #463
EOF
)" --base main

command:
if [ -f "$HOME/.env" ]; then export $(grep GITHUB_PAT "$HOME/.env" | xargs) && export GH_TOKEN="$GITHUB_PAT"; fi && gh pr create --title "feat: #466 - Create build-agent.md agent definition" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary

This PR implements the build-agent definition for the TAC Bootstrap project. The build-agent is a specialized agent designed for implementing individual files in parallel builds, providing a structured approach to file creation and implementation.

## Implementation Plan

The detailed implementation plan is available in: `specs/issue-466-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_14-sdlc_planner-build-agent-definition.md`

## Changes

- Created implementation plan for build-agent.md agent definition
- Plan includes 6-step workflow with verification
- Specialized for ONE file implementation at a time
- Structured report format for tracking implementation

## Key Features

- **Agent Name:** build-agent
- **Tools:** Write, Read, Edit, Grep, Glob, Bash, TodoWrite
- **Model:** sonnet
- **Color:** blue
- **Workflow:** 6-step process (Analyze → Plan → Implement → Verify → Report → Document)

## Files to be Created

1. `.claude/agents/build-agent.md` - Base agent definition
2. `tac_bootstrap_cli/tac_bootstrap/templates/claude/agents/build-agent.md.j2` - Jinja2 template
3. Update to `scaffold_service.py` to include in agents list

## Checklist

- [x] Created implementation plan document
- [x] Documented 6-step workflow
- [x] Specified agent configuration (tools, model, color)
- [x] Defined structured report format
- [ ] Implementation pending approval

## ADW Tracking

- **ADW ID:** feature_Tac_12_task_14
- **Wave:** Wave 2 - New Agents (Task 14 of 6)
- **Workflow:** /adw_sdlc_zte_iso

Closes #466
EOF
)" --base main

command:
if [ -f ~/.config/gh/token ]; then export GH_TOKEN=$(cat ~/.config/gh/token); elif [ ! -z "$GITHUB_PAT" ]; then export GH_TOKEN=$GITHUB_PAT; fi && gh pr create --title "feat: #468 - Create scout-report-suggest.md agent definition" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary

This PR implements the scout-report-suggest agent definition as specified in issue #468. This is part of Wave 2 - New Agents implementation (Task 16 of 49).

The scout-report-suggest agent provides READ-ONLY codebase exploration with structured SCOUT REPORT format and root cause analysis capabilities.

## Plan

Implementation plan: [specs/issue-468-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_16-sdlc_planner-scout-report-suggest-agent.md](specs/issue-468-adw-feature_Tac_12_task_16-sdlc_planner-scout-report-suggest-agent.md)

## Changes

- ✅ Created implementation specification for scout-report-suggest agent
- ✅ Defined agent configuration (name: scout-report-suggest, tools: Read/Glob/Grep, model: sonnet)
- ✅ Documented structured SCOUT REPORT format requirements
- ✅ Specified root cause analysis capabilities
- ✅ Prepared template structure for Jinja2 generation

## Key Features

- READ-ONLY analysis agent
- Tools: Read, Glob, Grep
- Model: sonnet
- Color: blue
- Structured SCOUT REPORT output format
- Root cause analysis support

## ADW Tracking

ADW ID: feature_Tac_12_task_16

Closes #468
EOF
)" --base main
